response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a step-by-step approach to refactor batch jobs using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+, improving efficiency and scalability.
key_points: Utilize FastAPI for building efficient, modern, and high-performance APIs
Leverage async functionality in FastAPI to handle batch jobs concurrently
Refactor existing synchronous batch scripts into asynchronous functions for improved performance
Implement queue management using libraries like aioqueues for handling multiple tasks
Take advantage of Python 3.12+ features, such as improved async/await syntax
